Question
========

A complete deck of 52 cards contains 13 diamond cards. Olivier plays together with his wife Maria. He currently has two diamond cards and he knows that Maria has three cards, one of which is a diamond. What is the probability for Olivier that the next card is *NOT* diamonds?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,21
* 0,23
* 0,25
* 0,79

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.21: Incorrect
* 0.23: Incorrect
* 0.25: Incorrect
* 0.79: Correct
